{"step_by_step_thinking": "Dysembryoplastic neuroepithelial tumors (DNETs) are a type of brain tumor. According to Document [10], gamma knife radiosurgery has been used in the treatment of DNETs. Document [13] also suggests that following tumor progression, radiation therapy may be an effective treatment. Therefore, it can be concluded that radiosurgery can be used for the treatment of DNET tumors.", "answer_choice": "A"}
